participant_1.background:
I often take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.
i am an aspiring writer.
I usually do laundry once a week because I have four daughters and they go through a lot of clothes.
i am afraid of clowns.
I remember listening to the radio with my father and singing along to the songs.

participant_2.background:
I didn't have any contact with my parents last year.
I’m excited to start my new internship and learn more about construction.
I spend most of my days working hard on my farm, but when I get a chance to relax, I love to swim.
As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office.
I am raising my kids on my own.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I'm a banker, and I love my job!
That's awesome! I'm an aspiring writer, but I also work on my family farm.
That's a lot of responsibility! I'm sure your family is grateful for all your hard work.
They are, but I don't mind. I love working on the farm.
I can see why! It sounds like a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
It is! I also love spending time with my family.
That's the best part about working on a farm!
Yes, I have two little boys.
That's great! I have four daughters.
Oh wow, you must have your hands full!
I do, but it's a lot of fun.
I can imagine! So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll take my daughters to the park.
That sounds like a great idea!
Yeah, I think they'd love that.
